Name: Landing Page - Complete
Description: Beautiful landing page with 11 sections: Hero, Problem, How It Works, Features, AI Showcase, Personas, Pricing, Timeline, Testimonials, FAQ, CTA. Fully responsive with glass-morphism design.

Name: Next.js 16 + Tailwind v4 Setup
Description: Modern tech stack setup with Next.js 16 App Router, React 19, Tailwind CSS v4, and shadcn/ui components. TypeScript configured with path aliases.

Name: Internationalization (i18n)
Description: Full English and Hebrew support with next-intl. RTL layout for Hebrew with dedicated fonts (Inter/Heebo). Locale-based routing (/en, /he).

Name: Theme System
Description: Dark/light mode toggle with next-themes. Persistent theme preference. Beautiful color schemes for both modes.

Name: Supabase Auth Integration
Description: Email/password authentication with Supabase. Sign-in, sign-up, and sign-out server actions. Email verification flow with confirmation route.

Name: Sign-In Page
Description: Complete sign-in form with email/password fields, form validation, error handling, loading states, and links to sign-up/forgot password.

Name: Sign-Up Page
Description: Registration page with email, password, confirm password. Password validation (min 6 chars). Success state showing check email message.

Name: Auth Middleware
Description: Middleware handling locale detection and Supabase session refresh. JWT validation and cookie management for persistent sessions.

Name: Users Database Table
Description: Supabase users table with auto-sync from auth.users trigger. Row-Level Security (RLS) policies for data isolation. Basic profile fields.

Name: Protected Dashboard
Description: Dashboard page with session check redirect. Welcome message, 3 metric cards (Properties, Investments, Alerts), navigation, sign-out button.

Name: Supabase Client Utilities
Description: Server-side and browser-side Supabase client helpers with proper cookie handling for SSR.

Name: UI Component Library
Description: shadcn/ui components: Button, Input, Label, Card, Accordion, Badge, Separator. Custom: GlassPanel, GradientText, FeatureCard, PricingCard.

Name: Navigation & Footer
Description: Fixed navbar with logo, nav links, language switcher, theme toggle, login/CTA buttons. Footer with links and copyright.

Name: Properties Database Schema
Description: Create properties table: id, title, description, country, city, address, price, currency, property_type, bedrooms, bathrooms, area_sqm, yield_percentage, images[], agent_id, status, created_at. Add RLS policies.

Name: Property Listing API
Description: Server actions for CRUD operations: createProperty, getProperties, getPropertyById, updateProperty. Include filtering by country, price range, property type.

Name: Property Marketplace Page
Description: Grid/list view of properties with search bar, filters (country, price, type), sorting options. Responsive cards showing image, price, location, yield.

Name: Property Detail Page
Description: Full property page with image gallery, description, specs, location map placeholder, contact agent button, save to favorites.

Name: User Profile Setup
Description: Expand user profile: investment_goals, budget_min, budget_max, preferred_markets[], risk_tolerance, citizenship. Profile completion wizard after signup.

Name: Professionals Database Schema
Description: Create professionals table: id, user_id, type (lawyer/accountant/broker), specialties[], countries[], bio, rating, review_count, hourly_rate, availability.

Name: Professional Directory Page
Description: Searchable directory of verified professionals. Filter by type, country, specialty. Profile cards with rating, reviews, contact button.

Name: Deals Database Schema
Description: Create deals table: id, buyer_id, property_id, professional_id, status (searching/offer/financing/legal/closing/complete), created_at, updated_at.

Name: Deal Tracking Dashboard
Description: User's active deals with status pipeline view. Click to see deal details, assigned professionals, documents, timeline.

Name: Search & Filter Component
Description: Reusable search component with debounced input, filter chips, clear all. Used across properties, professionals, deals.

Name: Mobile Responsive Fixes
Description: Review and fix mobile layouts for dashboard, property pages, professional directory. Ensure touch-friendly interactions.

Name: Financing Offers Schema
Description: Create financing_offers table: id, user_id, lender_name, loan_amount, interest_rate, term_years, monthly_payment, ltv_ratio, status.

Name: Mortgage Calculator
Description: Calculator component: input price, down payment, rate, term. Output monthly payment, total interest, amortization preview.

Name: Documents Storage Setup
Description: Configure Supabase Storage bucket for deal documents. Upload/download server actions with proper access control.

Name: Image Upload for Properties
Description: Supabase Storage integration for property images. Multi-image upload, thumbnail generation, image optimization.

Name: Favorites/Watchlist
Description: Create favorites table: user_id, property_id. Server actions to add/remove favorites. Show saved properties in dashboard.

Name: Contact Professional Form
Description: Modal form to send inquiry to professional. Include property context, message, preferred contact method.

Name: Notifications System
Description: Create notifications table. Server actions for creating notifications. UI bell icon with unread count, dropdown list.

Name: Error Boundary Components
Description: Add error boundaries for graceful failure handling. Custom error pages for 404, 500. Loading skeletons for data fetching.

Name: SEO & Meta Tags
Description: Dynamic meta tags for property pages (og:image, description). Sitemap generation. robots.txt configuration.

Name: Stripe Payment Integration
Description: Stripe integration for subscription payments. Checkout flow, webhook handling, plan gating for Pro/Partner tiers. ILS support.
